Name: SQSQueuePolicy
Documentation:
The AWS::SQS::QueuePolicy type applies a policy to SQS queues.
AWS::SQS::QueuePolicy Snippet: Declaring an Amazon SQS Policy

Parameters.Name: PolicyDocument
Parameters.Documentation: A policy document containing permissions to add to the specified SQS queues.

Parameters.Name: Queues
Parameters.Documentation: The URLs of the queues to which you want to add the policy. You can use the Ref function to specify an AWS::SQS::Queue resource.
